attributes.action: Stop innocent home owners getting black listed due to past owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since me and my wife met in 2000 we are always having problems getting credit from ie mortgages,car finance home insurance we get turned down for everything we are even having trouble affording a car and insurance cos our house is black listed due to past owners! Because of this we always have to pay higher premiums which isnt fair cos me and my wife have never been in debt never owned anything to anyone and we are constantly struggling !!!!! my daughter cant have the stuff she needs due to big businesses taking our money!!! They have to be a way of proofing easily that it was the past owners!!! It really isnt fair!
